thread.title: Kim Woodburn drops MASSIVE hint her husband proposed during sex: 'He was quite a goer'
thread.title_full: Kim Woodburn drops MASSIVE hint her husband proposed during sex: 'He was quite a goer'

author: Hayley Minn
title: Kim Woodburn drops MASSIVE hint her husband proposed during sex: 'He was quite a goer'
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Kim Woodburn has dropped a massive hint her husband Peter proposed to her while they were having sex! 
The How Clean Is Your House host made the shock confession after her Celebrity Big Brother housemates asked about her marriage. 
The 74 year old revealed her husband “was quite a goer” as she suggested he popped the question in bed. 
Jamie O’Hara asked her: “Are you married Kim?” Read More Kim revealed the raunchy place her husband proposed (Photo: Channel 5) They've been married for 38 years 
She replied: “Thirty-eight years! A smasher!” 
She went on to talk about her first marriage, calling her former partner a “horror”. 
But she was much more positive about Peter, who she has been married to since 1979. 
Kim said: “My first husband was a horror… My second husband is absolutely super!” Read More He proposed in bed (Photo: Rex) 
Jessica Cunningham then probed her for more details, asking: “How did he propose?” 
Kim gave her a coy smile and added: “I can’t tell you that… Take a guess lovie!” 
Shocked, Jessica asked: “Were you doing the do?” 
And Kim replied: “My husband was a goer you know!” 
* Celebrity Big Brother continues tonight at 9pm on Channel 5 Like us on Facebook
